thread.title: NELLIE MEINHOLD
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by NELLIE MEINHOLD

author: NELLIE MEINHOLD
title: NELLIE MEINHOLD
text:
My order was received on time. However this time it was not as frozen as it always has been. Yes it had the ice but other than cold it was not
frozen.and if I was not home to receive it I think all would be thawed completely.
I also feel like when you sent me my conformation you could put what was ordered as you always did before. I don't have Adobe and no matter how hard I tried to install it I couldn't. Why can't you just sent it with the email like always? I order from other places and they all put it in my email. Please consider doing this again Thank you
